description:
Murakoshi was a student at the Okayama First High School (Okayama Daiichi Kōkō 岡山第一高校) and the opponent of http://anidb.net/ch142583 [Shiunji Minami] during the finals of inter-school tennis tournament.
Although Minami, who at the time was suffering from a leg injury, showed great form against Murakoshi in the beginning she ultimately lost the match which in turn resulted in the loss of her team.
name: Murakoshi
